Dan Bricklin

Dan Bricklin

Creator, VisiCalc

Dan Bricklin, with a BS in CS/EE and an MBA, is a software developer, entrepre- neur, and longtime blogger. He is best known for co-developing VisiCalc, the first PC spreadsheet program, and has continued developing a variety of products to this day, including many for the Internet.

Dan will tell us some of the history of that development, talk about where some of computer technology is going today, and take your questions. He brings lots of photos and some video to augment his talk.

VisiCalc was the first spreadsheet program available for personal computers. It may well be the application that turned the microcomputer from a hobby for computer enthusiasts into a serious business tool, making it the first ‘killer app.’ VisiCalc sold over 700,000 copies in six years.
